response.overview: Award-winning Colorado apiary Bee Squared locally sources and produces honey and honey products. Beth, the owner and operator takes us on a tour of her facility in Berthoud, Colorado and shows us her bees, and walks us through the process of extracting and bottling the honey. She teaches us about bees and how the state of pollinators is declining, but not without showing how we can all help strengthen them and thus our environment. The future will depend on these super species!
response.tagline: Explore how honey is made and learn about bees and how to help save them!
response.title: Hive to Honey
